questions.question: This story arc is named after its geographical formation and features the first appearance of Admiral Aokiji. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: Taking place on a ghostly island, this arc introduces a skeleton musician and features battles against zombie-like enemies. What is...?
Set in the dangerous New World, this arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' alliance with the Heart Pirates to take down one of the Four Emperors. What is...?
This technique, used by Franky, involves a powerful blast from his mechanical body. What is...?
This ability allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This character, a princess of the Fish-Man Island, has the ability to communicate with sea kings. Who is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This vice admiral of the Marines is known for his loud voice and the power of the Barrier-Barrier Fruit. Who is...?
